posts.text: How #America has changed. In 1872, President Ulysses S. Grant was arrested for speeding. He was taken to the local police station and booked (released after posting a $20 bond). #Trump daily commits more heinous crimes and the police and the courts turn a blind eye. Disgraceful. #UnitedStates
